title: Driver dies as car overturns on Pensnett high street
article: A motorist has died and a passenger was seriously injured after a car overturned in the West Midlands. A 26-year-old woman who was driving was confirmed dead at the scene on High Street in Pensnett, Dudley, at about 21:00 GMT on Tuesday. The passenger was taken to Russells Hall Hospital in Dudley where her condition was described as "stable". West Midlands Police said the car hit the central reservation and no other vehicles were involved.The force appealed for anyone who saw what happened, or who may have dashcam footage, to come forward. The woman's family has been informed and are being supported by specialist officers. Det Con Chris Ridge said: "Our thoughts remain with this young woman's family at this difficult time."
